problem: Find the sum of all the multiples of 3 or 5 below 1000.

Find the largest palindrome made from the product of two 3-digit numbers.
What is the smallest number divisible by each of the numbers from 1 to 20?

Discover the longest product of adjacent digits in the 1000-digit number.
